questions.question: What is the primary benefit that you have received from (product or service name)?
What are the top three benefits you get from (product or service name)?
How would you feel if you could no longer use (product or service name)? Why?
What would you likely use as an alternative to (product or company name) if it were no longer available?
Have you recommended (product or company name) to anyone? If so how did you describe it?
What’s the biggest challenge you currently face in your role?
What are your 3-6 month goals in your role?
What the biggest stress in your job?
What are the biggest obstacles to achieving your goals?
What would hold you back from making a purchasing decision?
What social media networks do you use regularly?
Are you active in any LinkedIn groups, Facebook groups, or other online communities?
Are there any YouTube channels in X industry that you subscribe to?
Where do you spend the most time online?
Would you recommend a friend or colleague to work at our company? Why?
During a typical week, how often do you feel stressed at work?
How well are you paid for the work you do?
Do you see yourself working here one year from now?
If you were to quit tomorrow, what would your reason be?
Why did your purchase from our company?
How did you find our website?
Was it easy to find the products you wanted?
Are you satisfied with the product or service you ordered?
How can we improve our purchase process?
